title: China's Special Representative for Eurasian Affairs, Li Hui, expressed China's support for an international peace conference ...
content: China's Special Representative for Eurasian Affairs, Li Hui, expressed China's support for an international peace conference involving Russia and Ukraine on equal terms. Li emphasized China's readiness to accept anything that aids de-escalation and negotiations. China has submitted proposals to ensure the success of the peace conference planned by Switzerland for this summer
author: Live UA Map
